content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No completed structures have been successfully placed on the map so far. Multiple attempts were made to locate or place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) but none succeeded, and no other composite structures (such as furnaces for production) were built by the agent in these steps.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Consistency:
 – When using get_entities, adhere strictly to its defined signature. Avoid unrecognized keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or extra positional arguments. Verify the required parameter format before calling.
• Inventory Validation for Placement:
 – Confirm that the intended item (such as a Lab) exists in inventory prior to placement. This prevents errors like “No lab in inventory” during placement attempts.
• Handling Empty or None Returns:
 – Check for None when retrieving entities and use a fallback (such as an empty list) before iterating. This avoids runtime errors when expecting an iterable.
• Crafting Resource Sufficiency:
 – Ensure all sub-ingredients for complex craftable items (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables for a Lab) are available in the proper amounts. Review error messages for missing components and focus on producing sufficient intermediate items to meet crafting requirements.
